item.title: Project "Who's there?"
item.description: Praxisprojekt im Bachelor B5. Who’s there? How are y’all? - Light-Weight Telepresence with HTML5 Barne Kleinen The question of how to provide an awareness of coworkers, colleagues, fellow students and friends in a spatially remote working team has been the subject of research for over 25 years. Namely, there has been a wide array of elaborate setups to provide a sense or even awareness of the remote ones: videoconferencing rooms extending visually to the remote site, telepresence robots or even remote sports and games.
